posts.post_title: N175 Gypsy Queen Whitney SGC 10 for sale
posts.post_content:
$1,100.00. First come, first served. Email me at [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url] to reserve. NO PMs. I do not usually check private messages on this site. Note that asking for a lower price of larger scans will not reserve the card for you. First "I'll take it" will take it. Check or money order only. NO PAYPAL. Visit my updated website below. Many prices lowered. Thank you for looking.
